TITLE: Installing Rive Canvas Package via NPM
DESCRIPTION: Command to install the @rive-app/canvas package via NPM. This package provides a high-level Rive API using CanvasRenderingContext2D for rendering animations in web applications.
SOURCE: https://github.com/rive-app/rive-wasm/blob/master/js/npm/canvas/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npm install @rive-app/canvas
```

TITLE: Building rive-wasm Project
DESCRIPTION: Command to build the latest WASM and JS API bundles for the rive-wasm project. This should be run from the 'js' folder after making changes to the source code.
SOURCE: https://github.com/rive-app/rive-wasm/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-17_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:


TITLE: Updating Git Submodules for rive-runtime
DESCRIPTION: Commands to update the rive-runtime submodule, which is a dependency for the rive-wasm project. This ensures the latest version of the underlying runtime is used.
SOURCE: https://github.com/rive-app/rive-wasm/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-17_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
# First time through if you just pulled down the project
git submodule update --init --recursive

# When updating the submodule after the initial pull
git submodule update --recursive

cd submodules/rive-runtime
git checkout origin/master
cd ../../..
```

```
npm i
```

TITLE: Creating a Bug Fix Commit in Git
DESCRIPTION: Example of a commit message format for bug fixes in the rive-wasm repository. Commit messages should be descriptive and indicate the type of change being made.
SOURCE: https://github.com/rive-app/rive-wasm/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-17_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```

```

DESCRIPTION: Example of a commit message format for major version releases in the rive-wasm repository. Major changes should be prefaced with "Major:" to clearly indicate significant changes for the changelog.
SOURCE: https://github.com/rive-app/rive-wasm/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-17_snippet_7

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```

```

TITLE: Configuring Robot.txt for Unrestricted Web Crawler Access
DESCRIPTION: This code snippet defines the robot.txt configuration for a web server. It allows all user agents (crawlers) to access all parts of the website without any restrictions.
SOURCE: https://github.com/rive-app/rive-wasm/blob/master/js/examples/_frameworks/spotify-player-app/static/robots.txt#2025-04-17_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: plaintext
CODE:
```
# https://www.robotstxt.org/robotstxt.html
User-agent: *
Disallow:
```
